short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension that adds the much-needed clear trash button to Notion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can empty the whole trash with just one click.
Simply click on the "Clear Trash" button that automatically gets added to the trash menu, and your trash will be cleared.

Source code: https://github.com/niklashenning/notion-clear-trash
